query: query promotionProductsItems( $storeId: String, $pageSize: Int, $navParam: String, $itemIds: [String], $storefilter: StoreFilter ) { searchModel( navParam: $navParam storeId: $storeId itemIds: $itemIds storefilter: $storefilter ) { products(pageSize: $pageSize) { itemId identifiers { productLabel canonicalUrl itemId __typename } media { images(size: 'sm') { url type __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename } }
